name: Teeth Quest: Dental Revolution
description:
a game about teeth, spikes, and the power of lasers. three teeth are leading a rebellion against the tooth fairy. will they succeed? the revolution is in your hands

you play as 3 different teeth: teethy, stinky, and goldie. they each need to pilot a machine called a M.O.U.T.H., but they have been separated!!! help them find the treasures so they can reach the M.O.U.T.H. and liberate all teeth.

there may be a problem in the browser version, where you can't advance past the first screen. just exit the page and come back if that happens, or download the game.

this was a submission to LM0B beginners game jam #21. the theme was "treasure" i interpreted the theme as having the player collect treasures. by collecting treasure, the player advances the game.

credits are in game

teeth? more like tubular!!!
